```{r}
library(readr)
sptext <- read_csv("All-seasons.csv")
#View(sptext)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(reshape2)
library(tuple)

```
```{r}
counts <- sptext %>%
  group_by(Character) %>%
  summarize(nlines = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(nlines))
  
topcounts <- counts %>%
  filter(nlines >= 630)
  
topchar <- sptext %>%
  filter(Character %in% topcounts$Character) %>%
  mutate(cleanline = str_to_lower(str_remove_all(Line, "[^[:alnum:] ]"))) %>%
  select(Season, Episode, Character, cleanline)
  
ntopchar <- nrow(topcounts)

topcharnames <- topcounts$Character
```

```{r}
charlines <- topchar
write_csv(charlines, "")


```
